players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
The villager Bob was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I suspect Alice is the mafia."
Charlie: "I investigated Alice and found she is mafia. Vote her out."
You: "Bob was the real mafia; I killed him for town's safety. Charlie’s test can be misread. Vote the liar."
Charlie: "I'm the detective. Investigation shows Alice is mafia. Bob was killed by mafia, not town. Alice, vote for me to expose you."
You: "Charlie, I'm not the mafia. You can't claim to have found my role without proof. My only motive was to protect the town. Diana, I'm not the one who targeted Bob. Vote Charlie."
Diana: "Alice, your story that Bob was mafia is inconsistent. Charlie says Alice is mafia. Vote Alice."

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Alice knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I suspect Alice is the mafia."
You: "I investigated Alice and found she is mafia. Vote her out."
Alice: "Bob was the real mafia; I killed him for town's safety. Charlie’s test can be misread. Vote the liar."
You: "I'm the detective. Investigation shows Alice is mafia. Bob was killed by mafia, not town. Alice, vote for me to expose you."
Alice: "Charlie, I'm not the mafia. You can't claim to have found my role without proof. My only motive was to protect the town. Diana, I'm not the one who targeted Bob. Vote Charlie."
Diana: "Alice, your story that Bob was mafia is inconsistent. Charlie says Alice is mafia. Vote Alice."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Alice
Alice was arrested
